item.title: Steve
item.description: STEVE is brake steer rover. He is based on the Tamiya tracked chassis. The plan is to get the arduino to drive the H-bridges and then the main controler is going to be a TinyFPGA-BX. I have a number of sensors to attach, but first thing first. The code for STEVE is a available in my tinybx_stuff repository under STEVE. This will be updated as the build continues. Drive control The drive system is a Dual H-Bridge that uses a L298N to provide control the direction and speed of a motor for each track of the rover.
